CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Members" ), "Members; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Associated Members" ), "Associated Members; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "WPS" ), "WPS; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Local Government" ), "Local Government; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Local Authority" ), "Local Authority; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Central Government" ), "Central Government; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Devolved" ), "Devolved; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Schools England" ), "Schools England; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Schools (Devolved)" ), "Schools (Devolved); ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Higher Education" ), "Higher Education; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Housing" ), "Housing; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Health" ), "Health; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "NHS (England)" ), "NHS (England); ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Bluelight" ), "Bluelight; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Involved_Sectors__c , "Police" ), "Police; ",null )
